I would like to create/update (delete as applicable) a Compiler Preset on decomp.me.

**Preset Name:** e.g. `Superfrog 64`
**Platform:** e.g. `n64`
**Compiler:** e.g. `ido5.3`
**Flags:** e.g. `-G0 -O1`
**Libraries (if applicable):**  e.g. `directx5.0`
